title: Classic Men's Leather Ratchet Click Belt - Antique Silver Buckle with Charcoal Black Leather Belt (Trim to Fit: Up to 45'' Waist)
features: Perfect Fit Holeless Belt: allows for 1/4'' adjustments for comfortable perfect fit everywhere!
Trim to fit: You may customize the belt easily at home. Perfect gift idea!
Timeless Design: For every gentleman of all ages and for all occasions!
Genuine Cowhide Leather Belt: 1 and 3/8 inch in width, with built-in 32 position track system.
Durable Alloy Ratchet Buckle: Removable and interchangeable with other belts. Covered by full year warranty.
description: AventusBelt prides itself in providing timeless, comfortable, high quality ratchet belts that are perfect for any occasion!

- Our waistline changes throughout the day—especially after a meal or by simply switching from the standing to sitting posture. - A standard belt has only 5-hole positions, which makes adjusting very inflexible. - Instead of the traditional pegs and holes that conventional belts use, AventusBelts uses tracks and latches mechanisms to easily and comfortably adjust the buckle to fit your waist perfectly. - AventusBelt's ratchet system has

that allows for a perfect fit every time you put on your belt!Our belts are designed to have a smooth-flowing locking mechanism, light in weight, and sleek in style. The ratchet mechanism is carefully concealed so it is looks like a regular belt.
- Genuine leather fortified with Polyurethane - Incorporated Nylon track with 32-adjustable positions
- Durable Zinc Alloy  - Coated with chrome, matte or lacquered finishes

- We exist to provide our customers with top-notch quality ratchet click belts. Since its inception, we have served tens of thousands of satisfied customers all across the United States. - To ensure the high level of customer satisfaction, all of your belt purchases will be covered by:
Free return guarantee, plus 1 year warranty!
